cont.entity_a: Cannot connect to the internet despite multiple replacements. Frequent disconnections and crashes.
cont.entity_b: Signal quality varies, with some experiencing frequent disconnections. Range and signal strength are inconsistent.

cont.entity_a: Support is unresponsive, leading to multiple RMAs. Customer service is inadequate and unhelpful.
cont.entity_b: Good customer service experience for some users.

cont.entity_a: Advanced features like VPN and remote access available. VPN functionality is unreliable. Does not support some VPN software, like SSH Sentinel. Known issues with VPN functionality.
cont.entity_b: Draft-N technology is not fully reliable. Compatibility issues with certain devices and settings.

Setup.comm: Requires advanced setup knowledge for optimal performance.

cont.entity_a: Difficult to set up, especially for non-experts. Setup requires IT knowledge; not beginner-friendly. VPN setup is not intuitive and lacks documentation. Hardware is reliable but requires IT expertise for setup.
cont.entity_b: Easy installation for some users, but setup issues for others. Some experience issues with installation software. Some users find it easy to set up and reliable.

cont.entity_a: Firmware upgrades can improve performance but may cause issues. Frequent crashes even with the latest firmware. Firmware updates are frequent due to persistent issues.
cont.entity_b: Firmware updates necessary for improved functionality.

cont.entity_a: Good wireless performance with simple configuration for some users. Wireless performance is poor in mixed environments. Mixed mode wireless performance is limited.
cont.entity_b: Good performance with wired connections, but wireless range is limited. Router works well for some users with fast speeds. Good speed and performance with direct connections. Wireless N technology has reliability issues.

cont.entity_a: Lacks dual antennas for better performance.
